attributes.action: all publications big and small should offer a commission for photographers
attributes.additional_details:
there are a lot of terms and conditions in local papers and nationals that if you read them as even an amateur photographer or even a casual snapper whose just used their phone may not know.

Effectively allow the media to be able to sell or use your images with no reimbursement to the original snapper/photographer this to me is unfair they make thousands on the images the original photographer gets his name mentioned how can this be fair
attributes.background: many parts of the media ask for photos to be sent in, then re-sell the images due to their in my opinion unfair t and c's with no commission to the original photographer who has spent their time and outlay in getting the image, this also has a negative impact of photographer vacancies

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. As private companies, this would be the responsibility of individual media outlets.
